text: Abdoulaye "Diabis" Diawara (born 10 April 1981 in Abidjan) is an Ivorian footballer, who currently plays for KSK Hasselt in Belgium.kskb - Gele ditjes, blauwe datjes voetbal door Rudy Beck ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Ivorian footballers Category:K.S.K. title: Abdoulaye Diawara
